alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 9:37AM CDT until April 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Mississippi... Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Wilkinson, Adams and Concordia Counties. For the Lower Mississippi River ...including Arkansas City, Greenville, Vicksburg, Natchez...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY, APRIL 13... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Natchez. * WHEN...Until Thursday, April 13. * IMPACTS...At 48.0 feet, Carthage Point Road becomes impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 46.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 41.6 feet early Thursday morning. It will then rise above flood stage Wednesday, April 05 to 49.5 feet. - Flood stage is 48.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Mississippi River Natchez 48.0 46.0 Sat 8 am CDT 44.7 43.5 42.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 800 PM CDT.
